subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Tomas Kaberle, an All-Star defenseman for Toronto, is expected to be miss four weeks after breaking a bone in his right hand Thursday in game at Colorado. He has 4 goals and 30 points in 49 games this season.
